channel.title: Literature on Of Machines and Men
channel.description: Recent content in Literature on Of Machines and Men

item.title: Work I've been doing
item.description:
I’ve been very quiet, haven’t I?

Pictured: boxed Star Wars Despecialized DVDs I made for a friend; only Star Wars (IV: A New Hope) was ready for 4th May 2022

item.title: The Rhyme Bible
item.description: An audiobook, written by L. J. Sattgast, illustrated by Toni Goffe, read by Darren J. de Lima

item.title: Shakespeare Stories
item.description: Audiobook. A retelling of the Bard’s tales, by Leon Garfield (illus. Michael Foreman), read by yours truly.
